CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

We're excited to bring you insights from our recent activities and successes. 
View this email in your browser <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/IFk6CyJKgfEAzLEtKcOixaEnl?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>  	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ATRCCzxLjSvOp4vtNfDi943HQ?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
In this edition, we're excited to bring you insights from our recent activities and successes. Dive into a compelling case study that highlights BARBUSS's expertise in employer liability claims. You'll see how our meticulous analysis and strategic defense led to a successful outcome, mitigating significant risk for a leading insurer.

We also recap our recent business trip to Central America & the Caribbean, where we strengthened alliances and presented our value-added solutions in Costa Rica, Guatemala, and El Salvador. Discover highlights from key meetings, including sessions with Chubb Seguros Argentina, Newsan, Unnio Seguros Generales Chile, Chubb Colombia, and Tokio Marine.

Discover highlights from key meetings, including sessions with Chubb Seguros Argentina, Newsan, Unnio Seguros Generales Chile, Chubb Colombia, and Tokio Marine.

Finally, we'll cover our participation in influential industry events, such as the 7th International Insurance Law Congress, Conseguro 2025, and the IUMI MENA Forum in Cairo.
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/adf2f57b-7494-d292-7a30-d1ed9cf90a79.jpg> 	

CASE STUDY - A SUCESS STORY IN LIABILITY


In the complex landscape of liability claims, effective management is paramount. This case study demonstrates BARBUSS's expertise in navigating intricate employer liability claims, showcasing how a meticulous analysis of policy requirements and regulatory compliance can lead to successful outcomes for our clients.
 
Read on to discover how our strategic approach provided a robust defense against an unsubstantiated claim, mitigating significant risk for a leading insurer.

 
Full case here. <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/YzzbCA90kIMG3EMtqhviGaOFj?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 
Back to index
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/af15adcf-0014-0e21-9a6d-b5a551880971.jpeg> 	

CASE STUDY RECORDING


We're excited to share the recording of a recent case study presented by our experts, Maria Josefina Reta and Alejo Pérez Crespi.

This isn't just theory; it's a real-world example of how meticulous planning from day one, combined with a deep understanding of local legislation, allowed us to overcome the common hurdles of a bulk cargo shortage claim.

Access the full case study recording here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/HHeQCBRk0i3z983iOiBi2v4Wz?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>

Access the full case study recording here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/HHeQCBRk0i3z983iOiBi2v4Wz?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 


Back to index
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/vbEFCDJmnfQDK3QfqsPijhjce?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/9cf57d92-3286-675b-4d31-75f55c370de0.jpg> 	

AT 7TH INTERNATIONAL INSURANCE LAW

  
Our Andean Region Manager, Juan Felipe Carvajal, represented BARBUSS at the 7th International Insurance Law Congress in Medellín, Colombia.

This event, organized by Fasecolda (the Colombian Federation of Insurers), offered Juan Felipe insightful panels that delved into regulation, arbitration, healthcare, and sustainability within the insurance industry.

We thank the organizing team for making this congress a unique opportunity to connect and strengthen relationships within the industry.
 
Back to index
	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/b67f13dc-a4fb-7971-25c8-3aa407abf0ef.jpg> 	

WE WERE PLEASED TO PARTICIPATE IN COSEGURO 2025

  
We were thrilled to participate with Diego Intropido in Conseguro 2025, an event organized by CNseg - the National Confederation of Insurance Companies.

This conference brought together leaders from the insurance, government, and technology sectors to discuss the future of insurance in Brazil. Topics such as legal certainty, climate transition, and digital transformation guided the agenda of this key event for the industry's innovation and sustainable development.
 
Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/9ca67f82-75fe-2a3c-0f92-cac59d614169.jpg>

Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/9ca67f82-75fe-2a3c-0f92-cac59d614169.jpg> 	

STRATEGIC KICK-OFF FOR NEWSAN POLICIES

 
We had a very successful strategic meeting to mark the official start of Newsan's new insurance policies. Teams from Sancor Seguros, Assist Cargo, and Hawk Group S. A. also participated.

This was a great opportunity to reinforce our commitment, share perspectives, and work on continuously improving our processes. We're always aiming for greater efficiency and smoother operations in every step.

A big thank you to every team member for their support and dedication.

Together, we'll keep transforming the risk industry.
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ypuOCE6noUKkJpKf2t2i7MzZk?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/84c3f209-4b36-eb7f-98b5-5be9fbdb0ba4.jpg> 	

KEY PRESENCE AT IUMI MENA FORUM IN CAIRO


Pablo de Estrada and Ali Slim represented our team at the inaugural IUMI MENA Forum, solidifying our presence in the region.

Their trip was also a great opportunity to visit the historic Suez Canal and strengthen client relationships.
 
Back to index
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/14758d74-38c0-452e-b586-99ccfe766563.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/45235ca3-f288-bf8a-c3e2-5bd5a4e446c7.jpg> 	
	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/d3feebb0-b3f2-7ed8-630d-d7c17af35d91.jpg> 	

CLONESNESS TO CLIENT IN CENTRAL AMERICA & THE CARIBBEAN

 
Carlos Vila Moret and Martín Brandani recently traveled to Central America and the Caribbean, visiting Costa Rica, Guatemala, and El Salvador.

Carlos Vila Moret and Martín Brandani recently traveled to Central America and the Caribbean, visiting Costa Rica, Guatemala, and El Salvador. Their objective was to strengthen alliances and present our value-added solutions.
 
During this strategic trip, we had the opportunity to solidify our Recoveries service and our Claims service (inspections and adjustments) in the region.
 
We extend our gratitude to our hosts for their exceptional hospitality and collaborative spirit: MAPFRE El Salvador, SISAS ACSA, Seguros Universales, MAPFRE Guatemala, Aseguradora General, Asesuis, Confío Seguros (Guatemala), Seguros Azul, ASSA (El Salvador), El Roble, and ASSA (Guatemala).
 
We are committed to transforming the risk industry and driving our clients' success.
 
Back to index

STENGHTHENING TIES WITH UNNIO SEGUROS GENERALES


Our team of Adjuster Lawyers from BARBUSS Chile recently had a very productive meeting with members of the claims team from Unnio Seguros Generales. It was a true pleasure to connect in person and strengthen the ties we share. 

These valuable discussions allowed us to explore new and exciting opportunities and highlight how our innovative solutions can transform the risk industry.
 
Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/336ac31b-a821-59c6-9498-211f343a2408.jpg> 	

ENGAGING SESSION AT CHUBB COLOMBIA

 
A special thank you to Chubb Colombia and their Legal and Claims Department for welcoming us. Juan Felipe Carvajal truly enjoyed giving a talk on Compliance Insurance. 

At BARBUSS, we're committed to transparency and knowledge sharing to transform the risk industry.
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/_J0aCGQpqSo2pAotyuEiB5KW0?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/f3649e56-1998-d576-a0f8-f1e6cad68810.jpg> 	

KEY MEETING WITH TOKIO MARINE AT BUENOS AIRES

 
We were pleased to host the Tokio Marine team at our BARBUSS Buenos Aires offices for a crucial meeting.

During our session, we shared the results of our 2024 and 2025 KPIs, creating an essential space for collaborative analysis. 
 
Back to index

SHAPE YOUR FUTURE

At BARBUSS, we're at the forefront of innovation, and we're looking for passionate individuals to join us. Explore diverse career opportunities across our global departments and become part of a team driving meaningful change. Your future innovation starts here.
